title: 531 - Redefining the Challenges of Foster Care
itunes:title: 531 - Redefining the Challenges of Foster Care
description: Across the country, kids who fall into the foster care system are getting stuck in hospitals and institutions because there’s nowhere for them to go. Molly Tierney, the leader of child welfare work at Accenture, talks with Dr. Josh Sharfstein about these heartbreaking scenarios and how change starts with redefining the challenges, as well as what individuals can do in their own communities.
